```{r flowchartnpr, cache=cacheon, fig.cap="Flow chart, NPR population"}

grViz(paste0("digraph flowchart {
      # node definitions with substituted label text
      node [fontname = Helvetica, shape = rectangle]
      tab1 [label = '@@1']
      tab2 [label = '@@2']
      tab3 [label = '@@3']
      tab4 [label = '@@4']
      tab5 [label = '@@5']

      # edge definitions with the node IDs
      tab1 -> tab2 -> tab3 -> tab4 -> tab5;
      }

      [1]: '", flownpr[1, 1], "\\n n = ", flownpr[1, 2], "'
      [2]: '", flownpr[2, 1], "\\n n = ", flownpr[2, 2], "'
      [3]: '", flownpr[3, 1], "\\n n = ", flownpr[3, 2], "'
      [4]: '", flownpr[4, 1], "\\n n = ", flownpr[4, 2], "'
      [5]: '", flownpr[5, 1], "\\n n = ", flownpr[5, 2], "'
      "))
```
